metadata.title: Wellbeing | Yoga Stenungsund
metadata.description: Discover our treatments and individual sessions for wellbeing. PT-yoga, Tibetan facial massage, restorative therapy and more.

hero.title: Wellbeing
hero.subtitle: Individual sessions for your health and wellness
hero.description: Book individual treatments and sessions as a complement to your yoga practice or as standalone treatments for improved quality of life.

intro.title: Treatments & Sessions
intro.description: Our experienced therapists offer a wide range of treatments tailored to your needs

optimum.title: The Optimum Method
optimum.subtitle: MediYoga & Functional Medicine
optimum.description: The Optimum method combines MediYoga with functional medicine knowledge to help you optimize your health and wellbeing.

ptYoga.title: PT-Yoga with Sara
ptYoga.subtitle: Personal yoga training
ptYoga.description: Customized yoga adapted to your needs and goals. Sara helps you develop your practice with focus on technique, breathing and conscious movement.
ptYoga.about: Sara is a licensed occupational therapist specializing in stress and neurological treatments. Trained in hatha yoga, ashtanga vinyasa yoga and yin yoga.

restorative.title: Restorative Therapy
restorative.subtitle: Deep relaxation with Annika Valton
restorative.description: Treat yourself to a peaceful, calm moment where you fully rest, safe and cared for.

facial.title: Tibetan Facial Massage
facial.subtitle: 75-minute treatment
facial.description: A deep facial massage that releases tension, improves blood circulation and gives your skin new radiance.

malins.title: Malin's Wellness
malins.subtitle: Functional Medicine & Body Therapy
malins.description: Over 20 years of experience in healthcare. Specialized in functional medicine and holistic health.

recommendations.title: YST Recommends
recommendations.subtitle: Our personal favorites
recommendations.description: Here we share products and services that we use and love in our daily lives - both on and off the mat.
recommendations.intro: We gladly support small businesses and share products that truly make a difference in our practice.

curcuma.name: Curcuma.se
curcuma.description: Organic turmeric mix - Easy to order for flexible joints and happy stomach

ooo.name: OOO Yoga Mat
ooo.detail: Offers both wool and standard mats

vackralivClothing.name: VackraLiv - Magical Soft Skin
vackralivClothing.description: We recommend tights and tops from the "Magical Soft Skin" collection

wool.name: Wool
wool.description: Warm and comfortable for winter styles

avoid.name: Avoid polyester
avoid.description: Especially for yin and other winter styles

recommendations.quote: Here we recommend some of our personal products that we use and love in our daily lives - both on and off the mat

booking.title: Book your treatment
booking.description: Contact each therapist directly for booking and questions.
